Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 20th overall pick, by Minnesota in 1989...
Traded from Minnesota to New York (N) on 3/2/1989 (Going to NYM: RF R. Sanders, P W. Alvarez. Going to MIN: CF K. Yamamoto)...
Injured on 8/24/1989 with a Sore Shoulder, out for 6 days...
Injured on 6/18/1990 with a Strained Back Muscle, out for one week...
Injured on 7/17/1991 with a Blister On Finger, out for 4 days...
Traded from New York (N) to Texas on 2/5/1992 (Going to NYM: CF L. Dykstra, P M. Jackson. Going to TEX: CF M. Wilson, P W. Alvarez)...
Traded from Texas to Boston on 6/2/1997 (Going to TEX: LF M. Mora. Going to BOS: P W. Alvarez)...
